title: Why Choose Time Tracker?
text:
In today's flexible work environment, staying aligned with your team's activities shouldn't require constant check-ins or meetings. Time Tracker provides the visibility you need while respecting your team's autonomy.

For team leaders, this means:

Reduce Management Overhead: No more asking 'What's everyone working on?'

Improve Resource Planning: Understand exactly how long tasks take

Build Trust: Foster a culture of transparency and focused work

Make Better Decisions: Use real data to optimize your team's workflow


Note: This app requires GitHub Projects v2 and works exclusively with issues in the 'In Progress' status.
